metadata.title: CVE-2019-3309 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
[Unknown description]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3309` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

virtualbox - 6.1.18-dfsg-5
virtualbox-dkms - 6.1.18-dfsg-5
virtualbox-guest-utils - 6.1.18-dfsg-5
virtualbox-guest-x11 - 6.1.18-dfsg-5
virtualbox-qt - 6.1.18-dfsg-5
virtualbox-source - 6.1.18-dfsg-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: virtualbox package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.1.18-dfsg-5').
